title: Keep getting bug splats, cant even play the game
body:
I don't know what to do.

iv'e tried everything even uninstalling and re-installing the game.

nothing fixes it

please help

(i haven't played in 5 months and i'm on the windows 10 anniversary version of windows)

replies.body: If Porocles' solve doesn't fix it try disabling the XBox Game DVR. It's been another problem that some people have on the anniversary update.

With the recent update, you may have some outdated drivers or bad game files that's failing to render the game.  Thoroughly go over each step of the [game crash](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes+) guide to resolve this!  Let me know if you have any questions.
